00033   class Base;

00036 // Forward declare TiCppRCImp so TiCppRC can hold a pointer to it
00037 class TiCppRCImp;

00042 class TiCppRC
00043 {
00044   // Allow ticpp::Node to directly modify reference count
00045   friend class ticpp::Base;
00046

00048

00052

00071   void DeleteSpawnedWrappers();
00072 };
